review: Great product. Get the box instead, it has an advantageous processor.

review: Does not work with the Plex app (personal videos) which is one of the main reasons I bought it. From what I can see it is an Amazon issue. Please fix!! You shouldn't have an app on your media player if it can't work.

review: Love my amazon prime. The fire stick is a great addition and simple to set up.

review: So I got firestick for spare room where we have no cable. It is amazing. Can watch all prime movies. Major channels a&e; / TMZ/ the list goes on. I love it . I love the amazon eco system.

review: Has a lot  of older movies that are free with amazon prime
